data.meta_description: Discover life events, stories and photos about Harry Norris Leroy Shearer (1899â1990) of Carroll Township, York, Pennsylvania, United States.
data.text:
When Harry Norris Leroy Shearer was born on 10 December 1899, in Carroll Township, York, Pennsylvania, United States, his father, William Franklin Shearer, was 26 and his mother, Ida Solinda Bubb, was 28. He married Emma Leona Jane Taylor on 30 November 1922, in Dillsburg, York, Pennsylvania, United States. They were the parents of at least 1 son. He lived in Mount Wolf, York, Pennsylvania, United States in 1920 and Baltimore, Baltimore, Maryland, United States for about 10 years. He died on 6 May 1990, in Baltimore, Maryland, United States, at the age of 90, and was buried in Mount Rose Cemetery, Spring Garden Township, York, Pennsylvania, United States.
